StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCommandRecruiter]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @CommandRecruiterId int = 0 )
AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
DECLARE @CurrentDate DATETIME SET @CurrentDate = GETDATE()
DECLARE @RankHolder varchar(10) SET @RankHolder = REPLICATE(' ',10)
SELECT NWA_ID ,MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID ,ProvenPerformer INTO #NWA FROM MCRISS.dbo.NWA n
SELECT N.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID AS [OrgID] ,N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AS [MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] ,S.SHIP_ID AS [CommandRecruiterId] ,N.rowguid AS [NWARowGuid] ,N.NWA_ID AS [NWAId] ,@RankHolder AS [CurrentRank] ,COALESCE(RTRIM(P.LAST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(P.FIRST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME), SPACE(0)) AS Name ,COALESCE(RTRIM(RP.RANK_CODE), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(RCRTR.LAST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(RCRTR.FIRST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(RCRTR.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME), SPACE(0)) AS RecruiterName ,N.ProvenPerformer , DATEADD(year,C.TERM_OF_ENLISTMENT,S.AFADBD) AS [EAS] INTO #CommandRecruiter FROM MCRISS.dbo.NWA N INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.PERSON P ON N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = P.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACT C ON N.NWA_ID = C.NWA_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.SHIPPER S ON C.CONTRACT_ID = S.CONTRACT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_PERSON RP ON RP.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = N.RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.PERSON RCRTR ON RCRTR.PERSON_ID = RP.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID WHERE S.SHIP_ID = @CommandRecruiterID
UPDATE cr SET cr.CurrentRank = pg.RANK_CODE ,cr.EAS = m.EXPIRATION_OF_ACTIVE_SERVICE FROM #CommandRecruiter cr INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.MARINE m ON m.MARINE_ID = cr.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.PAY_GRADE pg ON m.PRESENT_GRADE_CODE = pg.PAY_GRADE_CODE
UPDATE #CommandRecruiter SET CurrentRank = NULL WHERE CurrentRank = @RankHolder
SELECT [OrgID] ,[CommandRecruiterId] ,[NWAId] ,[NWARowGuid] ,[CurrentRank] ,[Name] ,[RecruiterName] ,[ProvenPerformer] FROM #CommandRecruiter ORDER BY [Name]
DROP TABLE #NWA DROP TABLE #CommandRecruiter
END
